case_title: Smt. MOHINDER KAUR vs INCOME TAX OFFICER and others
judges: B. M. Lal, B. K. Sharma

impugned_orders.details: Proclamation of sale of residential house.

legal_references: Ambati Narasayya v. M. Subba Rao, AIR 1990 SC 119
key_points.main_submission: Recovery should first be satisfied by selling the factory property before proceeding to sell the residential house.

directions.factory_sale: Respondents to sell the factory property first to satisfy recovery.
directions.residential_house_sale: Residential house sale to proceed only if factory sale proceeds are insufficient.
